text: Stevie Wonder: The Definitive Collection is a greatest hits album, released in 2002, by American singer Stevie Wonder. == Reviews == == Track listings == ===US=== #"Fingertips (Part 2)" – 3:10 #"Uptight (Everything's Alright)" – 2:52 #"Hey Love" – 2:43 #"I Was Made to Love Her" – 2:35 #"For Once in My Life" – 2:48 #"My Cherie Amour" – 2:52 #"Signed, Sealed, Delivered (I'm Yours)" – 2:39
